website_summaries.verdict: This machine-washable rug features vivid colors and comes in a variety of sizes and designs.
pros: Also available in a variety of other sizes, shapes, and designs
Can be used indoors or out
cons: Some felt that this option was too flat, while others found it to be smaller than they anticipated
The letter picture choices can be a bit odd, particularly the X, Q, and U

customer_reviews.title: 3x5 is only a portion of the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product described here at all. We chose this mat because it has both water (that we can play with the ferry boat on) and the train-tracks (where we can play with the train and why my son chose this one), but the 3x5 version is only the center of the image, not the whole picture. The roads are huge and since it's just the the center it's all roads and parking lot and no grass or anything. Have to get a different one, my son is so disappointed. The only reason I'm not giving this 1 star is because if this was what we wanted, it would be a decent mat.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine &.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rug, vibrant colors but no Great Lakes, or major rivers as shown.
customer_reviews.text: As JN32613 said in their review, the rug is slightly different from what is shown to the consumer. There are no Great Lakes outlined on the rug and no rivers noted. Since I am a Michigander, the Great Lakes are kind of important to me. I'm using this rug in the kids room as a teaching tool. Other than no Great Lakes, or major rivers noted on the rug, it's a perfect fit for the room, colors match the walls in the room and the size is just perfect. Quality also seems pretty good for this rug. Have sent the seller an email noting this and hoping for a solution to get the correct rug shown.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug and, more importantly, my 2yr old does as well. He lays on it and plays with his cars for hours! The amount of detail is amazing. You can actually tell what the buildings are, unlike so many other rugs. My son plays rough and uses metal cars yet so far the rug has held up very well. We're beyond pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Town & Roads
customer_reviews.text: I selected this rug street map for our 20 month old grandson and he loves it and can actually see and know what parts are (barn, park etc). The roads are easy for him to have his cars/trucks drive down. Some of the other rugs I viewed did not have these features. Remember, kids are looking at this item either sitting on it or about 2 feet from the ground. The other rugs appeared too abstract and confusing roads.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite blue option out there
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the perfect one if it's right for your current color scheme. I think it's a pretty good choice in general. I might have saved a few bucks and liked one a little more in and of itself. But if you're going for a good blue theme, this was my favorite choice after a LOT of looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper/Davidson Family

customer_reviews.title: My boys like it
customer_reviews.text: It came in folded like a bed sheet so I have had I laid out for over a week now waiting for the wrinkles to come out. My boys love playing with it, which is the most important part and the reason it got 4 stars instead of 3. It’s a nice looking rug and the grip on the underside keeps it from moving around a lot. Overall, it’s a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This beautiful rug has a significant flaw
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this rug is perfect, with vibrant colors and age appropriate pictures with accompanying letters, that really pop. However, the rug is just too thin to be comfortable kneeling on with my toddler. It's one drawback of ordering online, you don't get to feel the rugs texture and thickness. If that doesn't bother you, or you happen to have a fluffy carpet underneath this rug to act as a cushion,I think it could really work for you.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Now to be honest i was in the fence about purchasing this rug. Ive had it for awhile now. I love it and the little ones are crazy about it. Ive washed it once only because my niece had a little accident. It's a great learning tool also. Nothing bad to say about this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and engaging for my toddlers but thin
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 yros are very engaged with the images, notably the high contrast ones - Cat, Unicorn, Zebra. (And it's interesting that Unicorn is considered an animal!) The carpet is a bit thin; therefore, it's a not very cushioned on hardwood. I am getting an Ikea carpet pad to put under it so that's an additional $15.
customer_reviews.author: T Sam

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is just the right size for the room I wanted it in. I like the fact that it is washable since it is in my grandchildren's playroom. The only thing I'm a bit concerned about is that there seems to be some bare spots in it. The spots aren't big & conspicuous, but, still they are there. Otherwise, I'm very pleased with this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Manx

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say here!
customer_reviews.text: The rug came a day early and it came folded up but within a few days almost all the bumps have settled out, the folds are about gone. It has a rubber feel underneath so the rug does not easily slip around. The colors are amazing and I love that it has a little bit of everything as far as the design. It's a great kid rug for the price!!! We have the 5x7 and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Backing comes off. Donot buy.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this rug for my grandson since he's ready to begin crawling. After 2 months of use the backing is coming off. It leaves a powdery white substance about the size of cornmeal. I do not recommend buying this rug.
customer_reviews.author: #col

customer_reviews.title: Great play rug...great size for large room
customer_reviews.text: Rug arrives with many folds. It takes a while for the rug to relax. In order to lay flat it needs to be on a wood or tile surface. It buckles on carpet. That said, kids love it! My 20 month old grandson crawled around on it as soon as I opened it. It is colorful and the art is clearly pictured. We have placed it in our downstairs recreation room. No sign of pilling or abrasion as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Weberly

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were in awe of this carpet. It’s not as cushioned as I would like it to be but I bought a cushion pad and it’s literally perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: Karma Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved this rug! He saw it somewhere and fell in love with it. Item arrived timely and was as described.
customer_reviews.author: C. West

customer_reviews.title: Fun rug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our twin four year old boys for their bedroom. They really like it. They take their cars and play on it regularly. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing better than I expected. My son loves it so much the measurements were exactly what it was described prod
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing better than I expected. My son loves it so much the measurements were exactly what it was described product does not slip it is in great condition I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nincys

customer_reviews.title: Clever product and fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This rug was a gift for a toddler who loves to drive little cars around on roads. It was colorful, durable and soft. The kids love it, it was a great Xmas gift and would work for a birthday or could even go in a classroom. This size was good for the familyroom or bedroom. The size could be good for a classroom but you may want a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: See Sea

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s sport themed room. His favorite color is orange and the colors are brighter than the pictures show. Really pops off the hardwoods. He loves it! Low pile and non slip back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Great for Homeschool Room!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality rug. We have had it in our homeschool room for almost a year now and it still looks brand new. It is very durable and it is bright and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Partin

customer_reviews.title: All states not labeled!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug specifically to teach my child the states, but there are several on the rug I received that are not even labeled. I contacted the seller, and was told it was a style of map. Not very happy with it at all. I would return it, but my kid loves it. I guess I'll just label it myself with permanent marker.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! It was true to color and nice quality. All the colors were very bright and the 5x7 size was perfect in the middle of the bedroom. Our two little granddaughters, ages 1 and 2, were really excited about this rug addition to their room. The two-year-old kept saying, I really like our rug! Then she grabbed up her toy vacuum and had a wonderful time cleaning her space. Great way to liven up any play space.
customer_reviews.author: JRRKansas

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this rug!
customer_reviews.text: ITS PERFECT FOR MY SONS PLAYROOM! Buy it, buy it, buy it! I’ve gotten tons of compliments.. someone even asked to buy it off me, of course I refused though.
customer_reviews.author: Breohnna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors and perfectly designed. seems good quality. will update if anything changes after washing
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very appealing, good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughters kindergarten class . As a teacher it is what she needed fir her class . Very durable and awesome colors
customer_reviews.author: designer4

customer_reviews.title: We use it in the block area and it looks great. The kids love the brightly colored pictures on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Pre-K classroom. We use it in the block area and it looks great. The kids love the brightly colored pictures on the squares and it is the perfect size for that center. I am very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Gr Haynes

customer_reviews.title: No Great Lakes
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. The Great Lakes are the same color as Canada. This kinda defeats the purpose of teaching kids what the US looks like, when the map isn't right. I contacted the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JN32613

customer_reviews.title: This rug is colorful and the perfect size. My six year old grandson and four-year-old ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug is colorful and the perfect size. My six year old grandson and four-year-old granddaughter were having a grand time standing on the different states that they have visited and standing on the states that their daddy travels to. A great learning tool, fun, and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for playtime!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for a baby play pen carpet! Colorful and fun design!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, bright letters
customer_reviews.text: The colors aren't matching well with the letters, kinda hard to see for a child just learning.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kids room or a play room
customer_reviews.text: This rug really pulled my son's room together. It's not super soft but it's not uncomfortablely rough. He loves it. Definitely something we hope to use for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug for pretend play
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have set up a little people city using the map, lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, perfect weight, beautiful details!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect weight, beautiful details, rich colors of small town with countryside. The little children love it!
customer_reviews.author: Glory Kennemer O'Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: The carpet is thin. It's very hard to lie on it. Dressed thin and pricking in summer
customer_reviews.author: FANTASTICNOODLE

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute rug for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I just have to say that I got this item super fast. I purchased it to go in a baby room, for an in-home daycare I am starting, and it is just what it shows on the website, and it is big. Super cute, great material, and I know my babies I watch will love crawling all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors are pleasantly vibrant and the kids really do play with the rug like a little city
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up well and is really durable. The colors are pleasantly vibrant and the kids really do play with the rug like a little city!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5x7
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and the colors are very vibrant. I wish I would have got a foot bigger on each side but beyond that it's a great play rug. P.s. it said it would be delivered by FedEx our something like that and it showed up in a Penske truck .. that was very odd. I've never had an Amazon delivery made in a moving truck.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia

customer_reviews.title: Rubber backing is flaking off everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 years ago . Initial impressions were good and it still looks great from the top. Unfortunately the rubber backing is flaking off and causing a big mess. The kids love this of course and are picking up the corners causing the rubber pieces to get everywhere. We are just about to throw it out..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Southern

customer_reviews.title: This one was a great addition to our classroom and I am very happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced rug for our homeschool classroom. One that was bright in colors and would stand out. This one was a great addition to our classroom and I am very happy with it. It has a rubber back to it so it does not slip around. For the most part for the price it is decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: TLChronicles

customer_reviews.title: Girl's bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This size is great my daughter's room. It fits nearly all of her play space on her wood floor and some under her bed. The rug is kind of purple to me. We like it though, it is easy to vacuum and roll. It is not a tripping hazard either so far. It is thin. My daughter's metal bed legs have made permanent marks into the fabric. Good price at the time for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright addition
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice addition in our large family as a focal point for the younger grandchildren’s play atea
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old and my 3 year old loved this carpet
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and my 3 year old loved this carpet! It is well made with vibrant colors. At $50 with free shipping it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: Bright and so cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a play mat for my 5 mo old. She loves the pics. It's the perfect size for us to lay on with her. Easy to roll up and move out of the way too. I think we will get years of use from this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cute from A to Z!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our nursery, which is going to be a general Dr. Seuss theme. While this isn't licensed Seussical, the font and animals go with everything perfectly! And it's made in the USA, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Estes (YA Author)

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks super nice but it's very slim and the quality is not that great but it's not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Sameh Elrahimy

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel, Great and bright colors. Doesn't slip ñ, we have it on wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenberg Family

customer_reviews.title: Size advertised was not exact
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable rug with a nice non-skid rubber backing. The seller listed the size as 7"10" x 11'3" which would have worked out perfect for our kindergarten class, however, the size we received was 7'2" x 10'1" so unfortunately the entire class does not fit, we need that extra foot we thought we paid for and were getting!! Still a cute rug but don't plan on having an entire kindergarten class sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Holmes

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: rolls up when not in use, kids really like it
customer_reviews.author: Dale P

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. Durable and loving the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Loreli100

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Rug
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a good value for the money. I am homeschooling my granddaughter this year and using it in the “ classroom” area. She loves it. And it’s a great way to weave in some geography each day!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Fay

customer_reviews.title: It's not very thick but that was expected for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not very thick but that was expected for the price. My daughter doesn't mind, she absolutely loves it! The colors are bright and vibrant, exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: SailorEve1112

customer_reviews.title: Needs color choices
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in pink or purple, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Conine

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. We are in the military and move a ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a carpet for the play room. We also needed color. This was perfect. We are in the military and move a lot so it's helpful to show the kids where we live and where we are headed and where their family are friends are. Beautiful color and it doesn't slip.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for play room
customer_reviews.text: Durable, colorful, and didn’t need a mat underneath. Looks great in the play room.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was not please with this product. It is very thin for a bare floor, and it took for ever to get here. When it came I wished I had gotten 2 because of the size. You really can't tell by the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for boys !
customer_reviews.text: Quality rug because it has held up perfectly in my 9 year old grandsons room for a year and looks brand new !
customer_reviews.author: cmp

customer_reviews.title: great size and durable.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our playroom. this size is VERY hard to find. easy to clean. STAYS IN PLACE! wonderful non-skid backing.
customer_reviews.author: Neka

customer_reviews.title: Small but good colour
customer_reviews.text: My child he likes it, only the size too small and price is a bit high
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that it still moves even though it stated that ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent rug for the price. I was disappointed that it still moves even though it stated that it had a no slip backing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great teaching tool. Fun to use and make game with learning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rug is very durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in the back room of our RV for the kids. The states are very clear and bright. Rug is very durable and easy to clean. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hylland

customer_reviews.title: great price compared to other rugs so the same size
customer_reviews.text: It provides a large play are for my Grandson, he loves it, great price compared to other rugs so the same size, but with a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: colorful and gives a nice bit of cushion to her
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grand daughter to play on. She loves it. Well made, colorful and gives a nice bit of cushion to her.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the size, but not a recognizableUSA
customer_reviews.text: The rug itself is a great large size for my classroom with a no slip backing. The colors are vibrant, however 1 state is two different colors and many states are not recognizable by their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh I love it!!! My daughter loves it!!! I'm absolutely satisfied!!!!! I thought the letter "f" and "u" were damaged but no that's how the carpet is. Fast shipping!!!!!!! Just awesome thanks so much Murano Home Furnishing!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Turned out really cute, with the table and chairs I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Faucher

customer_reviews.title: I love it & so does my grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is so practical & very colorful! I love it & so does my grand daughter!! Thank you. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I originally wanted was out of stock I do like the KC Cubs playtime rug much better
customer_reviews.text: Was an ok rug since the one I originally wanted was out of stock I do like the KC Cubs playtime rug much better.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaR

customer_reviews.title: Child approved
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a rug with fun animals and easy to read letters, I decided on this one. Grest choice by the way. My daughter loves coming home telling me about the letter they worked on at school. It also helps to keep my carpet clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aurtiska W.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Heavy, big, I was very surprised by it's size
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Rug for Nursery Room
customer_reviews.text: It was a great size for his nursery. The colors are vivid and strong. Just not extra soft and plush but thats fine. Baby loved laying and sitting on it. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old grandson absolutely loved this rug! He immediately laid down on it and began singing his ABC's. A couple of the pics are a little strange, but overall it's great. Good quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to play with his matchbox cars on this colorful rug!
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got it to put under my son's little table. It looks cute, is a good size, and is dark enough in color to hide dirty spots.
customer_reviews.author: kisha

customer_reviews.title: Great play rug!
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this rug are very vibrant and it is a nice size. My grandson uses it for cars and trains. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TNT SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this large and heavy duty rug in ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this large and heavy duty rug in our playroom, doesn't slide either. I don't even have anything under it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: My toddler and 7month old love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I got the larger rug. My toddler and 7month old love it!
customer_reviews.author: bianca Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rug to use as an assessment tool for prek or kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bright colors. The three year old that I purchased it for loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The backing of the rug becomes unglued and leaves a white, rubbery powder of residue left behind. Becomes undone each time more and more leaving the carpet with no backing.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Moreno

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This rug is very vibrant and perfect for our daycare! Very good quality and huge for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Anntoinette Mckain

customer_reviews.title: Rug is super cute, only reason I didn't give 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Rug is super cute, only reason I didn't give 5 stars in the packaging. I guess the seller wanted to save some money and folded the rug into a small box... Course we all know rugs folded down get all crazy wrinkled and takes so long with heavy books to get it to lay right. Besides that, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ann Rader

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR DAYCARE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price! Great rug for my daycare. Great quality and won't break your bank! If using it on carpet it will slide. I just ordered some grips :)
customer_reviews.author: Punkcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: A big hit at the grand parents!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and has been used every time the child visits his grand parents.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Gail Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Rug looks really cool and the kids play on it with the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Rug looks really cool and the kids play on it with the hot wheel cars all day. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my grandson to play on
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty rug, The only thing don't expect it to be a thick plush carpet. its rather flat.
customer_reviews.author: honda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize how big it really was but I love it
customer_reviews.author: JenniferN

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old great grand daughter loves this rug
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old great grand daughter loves this rug. She started learning her alphabets and loves the animals. She can name every animal on the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Andreia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Rug! It is so colorful and perfect for a home school room.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color. I picked this because it didn’t have the alphabet with letter sound pictures, i.e. wh sound for w should be a w sound picture.
customer_reviews.author: 77Burley

customer_reviews.title: Bright graphics
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Bright colors. Will be a Chrisrmas gift for my 2-1/2 year old grandson. I believe he will enjoy driving his play cars and tractors through the streets. Will be an opportunity for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. It arrived ina very timely fashion as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Chapdelaine

customer_reviews.title: Kids ABC Rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug was exactly as represented. The colors are bright and appealing to a two year old. So far it is holding up well with only light cleaning. I would recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase decision.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome. Great fabric and it is wonderful for the children to play on. They are learning their states and it is family fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my U.S. History classroom and my students love it. The colors are vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Arely Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: This is nice very vibrant colors, I like the mix of letters, numbers & shapes but not any padding kids might as well be sitting on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Main reason I bought was that letters are upper and lower case. Names are not the best, U , utensils; Q , quiche ; X, Xmas plus a cake??, not how we teach Christmas. These are not child friendly words. And chopsticks sticking up in bowl of noodles is offensive in some Asian cultures. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Great for a farm loving kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 4 year old stages farm animals, fencing, & small John Deere tractors on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea & Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the rug in my classroom for my students to sit on. . It is beautiful! It brightens up the whole room! The children and I love it! I would highly recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: T.E.

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors and no slip
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand-son and he loves it. It is everything it's advertised to be. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: michael russell

product_meta.title: Kids Rug ABC Fruit Area Rug 39" X 58" for Playroom & Nursery
